attributes.action: Declare the EU referendum result as Remain.
attributes.background: Scotland, Northern Ireland and Gibraltar vote remain, England and Wales voted leave. Remain wins by 3 to 2. If we are truly a United Kingdom this must prevail.

rejection.details:
We have petitions that deal with aspects of what you have put forward:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/144565
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/133606

The first addresses the different positions taken by the various nations of the UK and the second suggests not going ahead with a UK exit. You may wish to consider signing either or these, or starting a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
